descriptionHtml:
White Forsworn Armor

Note: female version only 

This is a simple re-coloring and some selective re-shaping of the forsworn armor in the hopes of making it more visually appealing, more like a wolf pelt, and just for the heck of it.

To install, place the \"forsworn\" folder in data/textures/armor 

To get the items in game, go kill some forsworn or if you\'re lazy use the console and type in the following codes:

curiass = 000D8d50

gloves = 000D8D55

boots = 000D8D4E

For instance to get a set of gloves type in \"player.additem 000D8D55 1\"

enjoy
author: rahv
